table.title: Select row to drilldown and obtain more information on each Location

search.query: `nvm_flowdata_index` ds=$Location$ pap!=Administrator AND pap!=LOCAL AND pap!=SYSTEM AND pap!=_netbios AND pap!=NETWORK AND pap!=linuxuid_0 AND pap!=_softwareupdate AND pap!=nobody AND pap!=_mdnsresponder AND pap!=_lp AND pap!=_locationd AND pap!=root AND pap!=UpdatusUser pn!='' | eval dh = if(dh="Unknown", da, dh) | replace '' with "Unknown" | stats count by ds | rename ds AS "Location" | fields - count

`nvm_flowdata_index` ds=$Location$ NOT pap=* OR (pap!=Administrator AND pap!=LOCAL AND pap!=SYSTEM AND pap!=_netbios AND pap!=NETWORK AND pap!=linuxuid_0 AND pap!=softwareupdate AND pap!=nobody AND pap!=_mdnsreponder AND pap!=_lp AND pap!=_locationd AND pap!=root pap!=UpdateUser) | eval dh = if(dh="Unknown", da, dh)| join udid [|search `nvm_sysdata_index` | fields vsn, iid,udid] | replace '' with "Unknown" | stats count by vsn, liuid,user | rename vsn as "System Name", liuid as "Logged in User", user as "User"| fields - count
